column1: '''Staddle''' was a village in [[Bree-land]], lying on the south-eastern slopes of the [[Bree-hill]]. Staddle was the main settlement of the [[Bree-hobbits]].<ref>{{FR
Staddle ([[Old English]] ''sta√∞ol'') occurs in real-life English place-names with the meaning "foundation", of buildings, sheds, ricks etc.<ref>{{HM
